sys_ux_client_script.name: Request page redirection

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_f3245a171aa282103d43f8e034a3c787
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="">3f245a1705a28210af5e078150724c96</macroponent><name>Request page redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;
    let sysId = "";
    const table = "task";
    try {
        sysId = data.look_up_record_2.result.task.value;
        if (state.producedRecordSysId && sysId) {
            api.setState("producedRecordSysId","");  
            emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
                route: "record_request",
                fields: {
                    table,
                    sysId
                }
            });
        }
    } catch (e) {}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-08 00:12:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>f3245a171aa282103d43f8e034a3c787</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Request page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Consolidated Aircraft Logistics Management System" source="x_1284052_consol_0">62a761f4832242103fcc9cc0deaad379</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Consolidated Aircraft Logistics Management System">62a761f4832242103fcc9cc0deaad379</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_f3245a171aa282103d43f8e034a3c787</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-08 00:12:23</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
